attributes.action: create legislation that enables councils to get rid of horses on public land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the increasing amount of horses being allowed use of public land this causes health and safety problems with people who want to use this land but the horses prevent people from using this land to the fullest. therefore make it possible for councils to be able to remove these gypsie horses from the land designed for people within a short period of time.
